task.title: How do I import a Sametime contact list?
task.shortdesc: You can import an HCL Sametime contact list as a way to quickly add a large number of contacts to your existing contact list. Or, you can import a pre-populated contact list, if you don't already have one, or replace your existing contact list with the names you import.

step.cmd:
Click
Manage Contacts Import Contact List
Select one of the following import options:

substep.cmd: From server to import a Sametime contact list from another server community you are logged in to.
From file and search for a file that contains the Sametime contact list you want to import.

step.cmd: If you are asked about replacing your contact list, select Replace existing contact list with imported list to remove your existing Sametime contacts list and replace it with the imported one. Clear this option to merge the contents of the two Sametime contact lists.
